2.caption_en:
Caption:
A Platform Growth Engine v5.0 template diagram illustrating the customer lifecycle stages — Acquisition, Activation, Retention, Revenues, and Referral — laid out across a timeline with sidebars for Consumers, Producers, and Partners. The sheet includes a top Goals field and a bottom Metrics panel for documenting objectives and KPIs.

{
  "type": "template_diagram",
  "title": "Platform Growth Engine",
  "version": "v5.0",
  "resolution": {
    "width_px": 1023,
    "height_px": 734
  },
  "language": "en",
  "layout": {
    "top": "GOALS",
    "center": "Customer lifecycle stages and timeline",
    "timeline_label": "CUSTOMER LIFETIME",
    "bottom": "METRICS",
    "left_sidebar": ["CONSUMERS", "PRODUCERS", "PARTNERS"]
  },
  "stages": [
    "ACQUISITION",
    "ACTIVATION",
    "RETENTION",
    "REVENUES",
    "REFERRAL"
  ],
  "visual_elements": {
    "flow_band": "teal polygonal band connecting stages across the top and bottom",
    "timeline_arrow": "faint horizontal arrow labeled CUSTOMER LIFETIME",
    "vertical_dividers": "dashed guide lines dividing stage columns",
    "sidebar_colors": {
      "consumers": "light red/pink",
      "producers": "light green",
      "partners": "light orange"
    }
  },

    "QR code (bottom-right)"
  ],

  "notes": "Blank template for mapping goals, metrics, and actions across a platform's consumer/producer/partner sides; designed for manual or digital annotation.",
  "confidence": 0.92
}

5.caption_en:
A schematic titled "NFX Reinforcement Engines v5.0" with "CORE VALUE" at the center and surrounding reinforcement categories such as Ecosystem/Sustainability, Demand-side, Supply-side, Brand/Loyalty, Data/Intelligence, and Tech/Infrastructure. The diagram groups related concepts around the core value to illustrate reinforcement engines for platform growth.

{
  "type": "diagram",
  "title": "NFX REINFORCEMENT ENGINES",
  "version": "v5.0",
  "central_label": "CORE VALUE",
  "labels": [
    "ECOSYSTEM / SUSTAINABILITY",
    "EXPERIENCE / PERSONAL / SOCIAL",
    "DEMAND-SIDE",
    "BRAND / LOYALITY",
    "DATA / INTELLIGENCE",
    "ECONOMY OF SCALE",
    "SUPPLY-SIDE",
    "TECH / INFRASTRUCTURE"
  ],
  "layout": {
    "center": "CORE VALUE",
    "top_center": "ECOSYSTEM / SUSTAINABILITY",
    "top_left": "EXPERIENCE / PERSONAL / SOCIAL",
    "top_right": "ECONOMY OF SCALE",
    "middle_left": "DEMAND-SIDE",
    "middle_right": "SUPPLY-SIDE",
    "bottom_left": "BRAND / LOYALITY",
    "bottom_center": "DATA / INTELLIGENCE",
    "bottom_right": "TECH / INFRASTRUCTURE"
  },
  "footer": "NFX REINFORCEMENT ENGINES v5.0",
  "notes": "OCR contained minor noisy lines not used: 'ere eat a ete eter ent', 'estar eee eens'"
}
